### Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Send out invitation (if applicable: don't forget to invite developers!)
- [ ] Schedule session
- [ ] Prepare note-taking Google Doc [link]
- [ ] Brief team members about roles and session plan
- [ ] Conduct session
- [ ] Debrief with team members after session
